name: Brutal Inventions
description: Brutal Inventions is a survival game in which you can craft workers and warriors as in a strategy game. You can gain 60 levels and improve abilities in 6 different stats. We are excited to offer you a new gaming experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8, 7, Vista or Xp Processor: 2 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or better Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: 3 ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980 or better Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space
